prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon with a rugged appearance and a mountainous habitat.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a stone monument, with strong defensive capabilities.
Design a Pokemon inspired by ancient megaliths, featuring earthy tones and a sturdy build.
Generate a Pokemon with a unique blend of rock and ground types, ideal for battles.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the tranquility of nature with rock formations.
Make a Pokemon with a large, solid body and a calm demeanor, perfect for a guardian role.
Give me a visual of a Pokemon that looks like stacked stones, representing stability and endurance.

distinctive_features: Features a flat top with smaller stones
